channel.title: 路透财经

item.title: 观看：特斯拉表示，其位于德国的工厂预计将在3月17日之前停电，此前一场疑似纵火袭击导致该公司位于柏林郊外的千兆工厂停电，被迫停止生产。
item.description:
WATCH: Tesla said its plant in Germany was expected to have no electricity until Mar. 17, after a suspected arson attack left the company's gigafactory outside Berlin without power, forcing it to halt production https://t.co/gDdvmZo1iU pic.twitter.com/s5LxA8os5U

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 德国面临三方面的罢工，火车司机、机场安检人员和汉莎航空地勤人员相继离职，给这个欧洲最大经济体的数百万旅客带来了更多麻烦。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Germany faced strikes on three fronts, as train drivers, airport security workers and Lufthansa ground staff walked off the job, spelling further headaches for millions of travelers in Europe's largest economy. More here: https://t.co/GU9WAVaHV3

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 德国最大的房地产融资机构之一--德国储蓄银行（Deutsche Pfandbriefbank）公布了自上市以来最低的年度利润和最大的贷款损失，凸显了房地产普遍低迷的严重性。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Deutsche Pfandbriefbank, one of Germany's top property financiers, posted its lowest annual profit and biggest loss for soured loans since going public, underscoring the severity of a widespread real-estate slump. More here: https://t.co/DP0QzbJsJo

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 观看：海关数据显示，作为世界第二大经济体，中国1-2月份的出口额比上年同期增长了7.1%，超出了经济学家的预期。进口增长 3.5%，也远超预期。
item.description:
WATCH: Exports from China, the world's second-biggest economy, in January-February period were 7.1% higher than a year before, customs data showed, beating economists’ expectations. Imports rose 3.5%, also far more than forecast https://t.co/Kyxej78lXR pic.twitter.com/OuPjSGCz0G

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 高盛上调 S&P 500 指数公司股票回购预期
item.description:
Goldman Sachs lifts stock buyback forecast for S&P 500 companies https://t.co/NwO6Bp3J8O pic.twitter.com/72UG9DisHa

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 更正：减肥药 Wegovy 的制造商诺和诺德公司表示，将提交其备受期待的肥胖症药物 amycretin 的早期试验数据。我们正在删除一个包含错误信息的帖子
item.description:
CORRECTION: Novo Nordisk, maker of weight loss drug Wegovy, said it would present early trial data for amycretin, its highly anticipated obesity drug. We are deleting a post containing incorrect information https://t.co/Pgun8skAVP

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 招聘市场疲软，PageGroup 年度利润下降

Entain warns of hit to 2024 earnings from regulatory measures https://t.co/zMRhnrg90w pic.twitter.com/Z8IKEdMADK

item.title: 欧洲中央银行将把利率维持在历史最高水平，并在未来几个月内采取小步减息措施，因为尽管潜在的价格压力居高不下，但通胀率仍在持续下降。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
The European Central Bank is set to keep interest rates at record highs and take baby steps towards cutting them in the coming months as inflation continues to fall despite stubbornly high underlying price pressures. More here: https://t.co/zdVZw5reqa

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 肥胖症药物威高维（Wegovy）的生产商诺和诺德公司表示，它将提交备受期待的用于治疗2型糖尿病的管线药物淀粉样蛋白的早期试验数据。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Novo Nordisk, maker of obesity drug Wegovy, said it would present early-stage trial data for its highly anticipated pipeline drug, amycretin, for treatment of Type 2 diabetes. More here: https://t.co/mS8wB3LGmW

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: Aviva 2023 年利润增长 9%，提出 3 亿英镑的回购计划
item.description:
Aviva posts 9% 2023 profit rise, offers 300 mln stg buyback https://t.co/3l7H7G8bgp pic.twitter.com/GUBtcaPue9

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 汉莎航空（Lufthansa）如期公布了 2023 年 29.4 亿美元的营业利润，但由于与劳资纠纷的斗争，该公司将 2024 年的营业利润率预期从 8%的目标下调至 7.6%。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Lufthansa reported an operating profit of $2.94 billion for 2023 as expected, adjusting its outlook for its 2024 operating margin down to 7.6% from a goal of 8% as it struggles with labor disputes. More here: https://t.co/UO2XGoxiCT

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 房地产危机期间利润骤降，德国 PBB 旨在 "赢回信任
item.description:
Germany's PBB aims to 'win back trust' as profit plunges during property crisis https://t.co/k1M9MwFFnD pic.twitter.com/1OHjwWyFdT

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 法国于 2 月中旬紧急削减预算，以确保其赤字削减计划按计划进行，但这不可能是最后一次削减预算，政府将在财政需要和政治现实之间艰难地寻求平衡。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
France's mid-February emergency budget cuts to keep its deficit-reduction plans on track are unlikely to be the last, leaving the government struggling to strike a balance between financial imperatives and political realities. More here: https://t.co/fj5saoexMd

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 自莫斯科入侵乌克兰以来，俄罗斯最大的两笔企业退出交易正待股东批准，"俄罗斯的谷歌 "Yandex 和主要矿业资产将转为俄罗斯人所有，交易总额约为 90 亿美元。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Two of Russia's largest corporate exit deals since Moscow's invasion of Ukraine are up for shareholder approval, with ‘Russia's Google’ Yandex and major mining assets set to pass to Russian ownership in transactions totaling around $9 billion. More here: https://t.co/pXHweRgrIU

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 观看：特斯拉表示，其位于柏林郊外的千兆工厂将在3月17日之前停电。该公司在发生疑似纵火袭击后失去了所有电力供应
item.description:
WATCH: Tesla says its gigafactory outside Berlin will have no electricity until Mar. 17. The company lost all power following a suspected arson attack https://t.co/gDdvmZoz8s pic.twitter.com/G3jqWwTIhm

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 从全面改造在线平台到后台工程，谷歌、苹果、亚马逊、微软、Meta 和 TikTok 的所有者 ByteDance 在过去六个月里争先恐后地遵守今天生效的具有里程碑意义的欧盟技术规则。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
From overhauling online platforms to backroom engineering, Google, Apple, Amazon, Microsoft, Meta and TikTok owner ByteDance have scrambled over the last six months to comply with landmark EU tech rules that come into force today. More here: https://t.co/HlWuWcIXDI

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 华尔街三大股指收盘上涨，原因是经济数据和美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的言论强化了美国央行今年将降低基准利率的预期：
item.description:
Wall Street's three major indexes closed higher as economic data and comments from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell reinforced expectations that the US central bank would reduce its benchmark interest rate this year.
Read more: https://t.co/Jq9gq8fEun pic.twitter.com/FEmwG6hFdN

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 特斯拉表示，它将退出澳大利亚主要的汽车游说团体，并辞去董事会职务，指责该团体在政府提出的燃油效率标准及其对汽车价格的潜在影响方面误导消费者。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
Tesla said it is quitting Australia's major auto lobby and resigning from its board, accusing the group of misleading consumers over the government's proposed fuel efficiency standards and the potential impact on car prices. More here: https://t.co/hN2aaaDGa3

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024

item.title: 中国 1 月至 2 月的进出口增长超过预期，表明全球贸易正在出现转机，这对努力支撑经济复苏乏力的决策者来说是一个令人鼓舞的信号。更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
China's export and import growth in the January-February period beat forecasts, suggesting global trade is turning a corner in an encouraging signal for policymakers as they try to shore up a stuttering economic recovery. More here: https://t.co/5rcNGh9CSz

— Reuters Business (@ReutersBiz) March 7, 2024
